attributes.action: Call for the resignation of baroness jones
attributes.additional_details: Force the resignation of this woman on grounds of breaching the equality act 2010.
attributes.background: Recently this baroness stated a sexist term in the house of lords by suggesting that she would consider supporting a bill that would place all MEN under a 6pm curfew. To suggest that all men are a threat to women is a breach of the equality act 2010 and she should resign for this offensive language.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for members of the House of Lords to be sacked or resign. Deciding whether to leave the House of Lords is a matter for individual peers, not the Government or House of Commons.
